nodes.bodyText: Pinging @ryanjdew - this is doing what xdmp.securityAssert does, but that needs a privilege. I'll get a PR together that has an example of this.

One small note, and no need to change (I'm going to approve) - for variables that aren't going to change, prefer "const" over "let". It makes for more readable code too, as I can see this and know it's never going to change.
